title: Recent Pentax ad type used? Trade Gothic but rounded?
content:
I kept noticing the type used on the new Pentax ads, but can't figure out quite what it is. Any ideas? Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150219144922im_/http:/typophile.com/files/img001_5318.gif)
author: atarijake

comments.content: [Ultramagnetic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150219144922/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0020) is a good alternative, with more weights.
